meeting_info.organization: Quality of Life, Arts, and Culture Committee
meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.title: Approval of the May 20, 2024, Quality of Life, Arts, and Culture Committee Meeting Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Urban Agriculture and Chapter 251 of the Texas Agriculture Code
agenda_items.description: Provide an overview of changes to Chapter 251 of the Texas Agriculture Code and potential actions the city may desire to take.

agenda_items.title: Consider amending the one-year limitation on subsequent representation by former councilmembers and former members of boards, commissions, and other city bodies in Chapter 12A
agenda_items.description: Discussion on potential amendments to Chapter 12A regarding representation limitations.

agenda_items.title: 311 Customer Service Budget Review
agenda_items.description: Overview of the Department of 311 Customer Service’s current and planned budget.

agenda_items.title: Dallas Animal Services Budget Review
agenda_items.description: Presentation of the proposed FY 2024-25 and planned FY 2025-26 budgets for Dallas Animal Services.

agenda_items.title: Office of Arts and Culture Budget Review
agenda_items.description: Overview of the Office of Arts and Culture’s planned budget for FY 2024-25.

agenda_items.title: Department of Sanitation Services Budget Review
agenda_items.description: Presentation of the FY 2024-25 Biennial Budget for the Department of Sanitation Services.

agenda_items.title: Consideration of a Boundary Adjustment with the City of University Park
agenda_items.description: Discussion on a boundary adjustment request involving Michael M. Boone Elementary and adjacent church.

agenda_items.title: National League of Cities - Cities Addressing Fines and Fees Equitably (CAFFE): People and Pets Assistance Program Grant Approval
agenda_items.description: Approval of grant funds to address disparities in fines and fees related to animal services.

agenda_items.title: Legislative Priorities
agenda_items.description: Discussion on proposed legislative priorities for the upcoming legislative session.

agenda_items.title: Quality of Life, Arts, and Culture Committee Forecast
agenda_items.description: Forecast of upcoming agenda items for the Quality of Life, Arts, and Culture Committee.

financial_items.description: FY 2024-25 planned budget for 311 Customer Service
FY 2024-25 planned budget for Dallas Animal Services
FY 2024-25 planned budget for Office of Arts and Culture
FY 2024-25 planned budget for Department of Sanitation Services
